content: *click through to website for free version of this pattern * i designed this basket to keep my glasses and phone for those late night menopause induced bouts of sleeplessness when i simply must play one more round of toy blast within easy reach the basket simply slips over the bedpost to keep all my essentials handy i ve since made others to hang on the stairwell to gather little things that need to be brought upstairs and one for the coat rack for keys and sunglasses they re the perfect size for all those little bits and pieces that would go missing otherwise the basket whips up very quickly in less than an hour so it makes a fast and easy project for anytime here s everything you need to know skill level easy materials * crochet hook us m/n 9 00 mm * 80 yards of size 6 super bulky yarn i used lion brand wool ease thick & quick * tapestry needle * sewing scissors stitches * slip_stitch slip_stitch * chain chain * single_crochet * half_double_crochet half_double_crochet * reverse single_crochet rsc *skip a stitch skip gauge 3 half_double_crochet row x 4 half_double_crochet sts = 2 s q size approximately 6 in diameter and 6 tall without handle
